body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. cast Consign to Dream
2. target non-red non-green card
3. look at the numbers top left: handsize stays the same, library increases by one
4. cast Consign to Dream
5. target a red and/or green card
6. look at the numbers top left: handsize increases by one, library stays by one What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I suspect I should expect it exactly the other way round What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? magarena 1.48.862 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
